website_summaries.verdict: Made of solid, kiln-dried pine wood, this armoire offers a clothing rod, beautiful louvered doors, and your choice of several shelf configurations.
pros: Once assembled, it is sturdy and attractive
Use it to hang clothing and store shelved goods
Your choice of color and shelving arrangements
cons: It's pricey and must be assembled, which some owners find more difficult than others

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice but some flaws
customer_reviews.text: I love that this whole cabinet is real solid wood. No particalboard at all. 2 things I didn’t like were.1) there were no directions in any of the three boxes. None at all. I had to find a similar cabinet online and print some out just to get an idea of how it went together. there are no downloadable or printable directions for this Exact model. 2). The back panel should have been two different sizes but the three panels were all the same size so they didn’t fall in a seam. And I was only given one channel piece to join them together should have been 2
customer_reviews.author: glen

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the wardrobe unit for my neice who moved into my basement. The unit iss beautiful and was easy to assemble. There is some weight to it, if you think it is flemsy you are sadly mistaken. We followed the directions slowly and took our time assembling the unit. It turned out bueautiful. I will probably purchase the extender in a couple of months, once she gets settled in more.
customer_reviews.author: WArnold

customer_reviews.title: Works for a small bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: I like having the three sliding doors with cubbies in one section and the ability to hang clothes in the wider section. I purchased and extra shelf for the hanging section to be able to put more shoes. It comes with the top shelf over the hanging section and four shelves in the cubby section. The directions were easy enough for three women to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: roseyfran

customer_reviews.title: Closet for a pantry!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a pantry... it worked great and fits even my largest pots and pans! I’m super happy with it and it came with all the screws and clips needed. I did buy two extra shelves that came with all of their hardware for installation. Everything was so easy to put together. Parts were number and so was the hardware. It looks great and provides perfect storage.
customer_reviews.author: Betty De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. The door glides are plastic. One has to be careful sliding the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It's absolutely beautiful!! We like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely beautiful!! We like it a lot. One of the doors came with a scratch and Palace Imports was very quick to reply and replace with a new door.
customer_reviews.author: BladeRunner

customer_reviews.title: The unit assembled easily using the picture-based instructions
customer_reviews.text: Although the unit suffered some minor shipping damage, the seller accommodated our request for an adjustment graciously. The unit assembled easily using the picture-based instructions. Although the claim of "100% Solid Wood" is true, this cabinet is made of finger-jointed pine overlaid with a fairly substantial veneer ... and is of much better quality than similar units sold in big-box stores.
customer_reviews.author: J. Renner

customer_reviews.title: In less than 6 months it fals apart
customer_reviews.text: I would give it minus 7 stars. In less than 6 months it falls apart - the doors are crooked, more than 1" gap when you close them. One of the doors just fell out. If you have small children it could be a hazard issue. Chinese magnificent crapmanship.
customer_reviews.author: xxx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for a small room.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for our small bedroom that is closetless. Also, matches the woodwork in the room so it looks like it was custom designed. It is sturdy enough for our needs. So amazed to find this item on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylene Prather

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, solid.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in the room. Took my husband and cousin a little more than half a day or more to assemble, but that wasn’t a problem. Directions were good, just a lot to do. It’s been great for my mom who moved in and needed a place to put her clothes and sweaters in our closetless room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality piece of furniture my husband uses for storing his hunting clothes. It went together easily, but we required the 2 of us to complete it. Instructions are pictures, not words. Never had that before, but worked fine. Took us longer than most, he is disabled, I’m 74. Very happy with end product..
customer_reviews.author: grammy 3

customer_reviews.title: Important to have all parts-screws,
customer_reviews.text: The wardrobe was short three screws. I had to buy similar ones the following day, annoying! I needed taller hanging space for my dresses. Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: great quality wardrobe!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for furniture to increase storage space in our bathroom and after a long research came across this wardrobe on Amazon! It's absolutely great and very spacious. It has 3 sliding doors what is perfect, color is great , made of high quality wood material and for the great price! Vlad, Customer Service rep was very attentive and helped us even with assembly! Thank you, Vlad! We are very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Ugolev

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty big wardrobe-Im satisfied with the dimensions..only a couple of things that I’m not too happy about-the wheels on the sliding doors (they’re plastic and don’t exactly slide smoothly..but manageable) and the color I was expecting it to be like an off-grey/brown but it’s more like a dark mahogany (which is still beautiful however if that’s not the color you’re shopping for..beware). The assembly is fairly easy and sits sturdy against the wall. Good purchase all-in-all.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Looks Good, Functions Great
customer_reviews.text: After we bought our old 1880s farmhouse, I began searching for a wardrobe for our bedroom. Antique wardrobes were too small or too big. Furniture stores rarely carry wardrobes any more. Newer wardrobes are cheaply made and too expensive. Then I happened upon this wardrobe on Amazon. It's perfect. The perfect look, size, and it's well made.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: This is great wardrobe. Real wood and really nice to have ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great wardrobe. Real wood and really nice to have sliding doors. It took about 2 hours for my husband to put it together. He just followed the directions, step by step. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: irwat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised when the Armoire arrived. This is a quality piece of furniture. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: aurora422

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions carefully
customer_reviews.text: The finished wardrobe is handsome and sturdy. Putting it together is easier than the ELGA system from Ikea, but that is a low bar.
customer_reviews.author: David K. vun Kannon

customer_reviews.title: Wardrobe is good but there are disappointments.
customer_reviews.text: The storage cabinet with optional shelves is working just fine. My only disappointment was how hard it was to assemble. It took about 4 hours for my husband and I to put it together because the pieces were not labeled. I'm also disappointed that two adjoining sections cannot be open at the same time. I didn't realize there were only two tracks rather than three and this was not mentioned in the description either.
customer_reviews.author: Jane D. Navazio

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not very easy to assemble but worth every minute putting it together! Very very nice !!! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Shubert

customer_reviews.title: Doors have issues
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for a few months now and one set is perfect however the other one is a mess. I don’t know if the track is off or if the doors are not straight but we have to fight it to open and close every time.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Instructions stink.
customer_reviews.text: I have put many pieces of furniture together from Ikea so I have experience with these kind of things. The instructions on this piece is awfull.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: It took a lot of work to put it together but was worth it. The wood was excellent and color was great . Looks good in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hallesy

customer_reviews.title: I won't recommend this product for anybody
customer_reviews.text: I really don't understand why this product is called 100% solid wood. Take a look at the photos attached. Except the sliding doors, almost all the parts cannot be defined as solid wood. Also take a look at the quality of the workmanship. I personally think it is not worth for $700. I won't recommend this product for anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyani Navaratnam

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compliments. Like the sliding doors and mahogany wood.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable Armoire
customer_reviews.text: Initially was beautiful. But in time raised panels shifted and now show unfinished edges at virtually all panels. Now considering having three new doors custom made at considerable expense so the front view shows a totally finished look. Would not buy from this group again.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Luebbe

customer_reviews.title: Well made...heavy
customer_reviews.text: Really do like it...would be better if just 2 sliding doors vs. 3 tho as would give easier access to inside. ...seems well made...
customer_reviews.author: k guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. Another casualty of our house being flooded!
customer_reviews.author: Frank R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Heavy! Beautiful in my bedroom! Somewhat difficult to put together even with 2 people. Have it for 3 month and still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Milka

customer_reviews.title: Quality and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality piece of furniture that looks really nice and is plenty deep enough. No doubt we'll have it around for 20+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made from wood alright but dust comes easily inside and out this wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: Expensive. Made from wood alright but dust comes easily inside and out this wardrobe!
customer_reviews.author: kriskezia

customer_reviews.title: This is ok, getting the door to slide smooth ...
customer_reviews.text: This is ok, getting the door to slide smooth took some work. You have to take your time opening and close the doors.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Seepersad

customer_reviews.title: Good waredrobe
customer_reviews.text: - Good wood quality - Nice and practical design - I have been using it for about 10 months and feel it will last long - Not very easy to assessable but not impossible either - Very well packed
customer_reviews.author: First Knight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well built, took two weeks for strong odor to dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: John Palo

customer_reviews.title: Corner warped
customer_reviews.text: Looked great when first constructed, month later the upper left corner seemed to warp out leaving a small gap between door and side. But it does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: John P Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I had hoped but it is solid wood
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect closet for her along with being well made
customer_reviews.text: In my spare room of a summer cottage turned into home, we used the closet in the spare room to enlarge the bathroom. Now my granddaughter has the room and needed a closet. This is the perfect closet for her along with being well made. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and material. Love it!! Definitely reflects the price and is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristhians V.

customer_reviews.title: SERVES YOUR NEEDS
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive wardrobe that served our needs. Lots of room. Well worth the money. A bit difficult to assemble but can be done.
customer_reviews.author: martymad

customer_reviews.title: Good but hard
customer_reviews.text: It was heavy in a box. I managed to get it down stairs. Took quite awhile to put together. We do like how it looks and how good it is for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Burchett Bird Man

customer_reviews.title: Lovely solid wood wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: This wardrobe is as pictured. Solid wood with java stain. Had to hire someone to put it together for me because it is not assembled and too heavy for me to handle. Looks great in my guest room when finished. Shelves are study and doors slide smoothly. I gave it 4 stars because needed to be assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The closet looks great, pretty roomy and not too difficult to assemble. It is not as sturdy as it appears to be. The wood is very brittle and the back is cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Cubero

customer_reviews.title: look real good, but not to be move around
customer_reviews.text: Took me 1.5 hours to put together , look real good ,but not to be move around , very well pack no missing parts, live in northern Maine had the cabinet in one week, four star cause the finish can be rubbed of on the edge on the conner
customer_reviews.author: Normaand L.

customer_reviews.title: Resonable quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This wardrobe is about 200lbs when delivered; so expect help to assemble and move it to the required place. The wood panels are susceptible to break if you press them too hard. We ended up with one snapped panel.
customer_reviews.author: seeker44

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy With This Product
customer_reviews.text: The product is overpriced. The quality of construction is poor and the assembly instructions are useless. One piece sent was the wrong one and was warped to boot. The one positive experience with the purchase was that the seller sent a replacement part quickly. There are holes drilled in several pieces that serve no purpose. This critique is from two people who are experienced amateur carpenters and capable of designing and constructing their own furniture. We wish we had done so with this acquisition.
customer_reviews.author: MBM

customer_reviews.title: Do not order
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy with this product. I ordered based on reviews calling it a "solid" product. Very flimsy is the reality. I'd love my money back...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yes
customer_reviews.text: it is sturdy and as described. I would recommend this to my friends. lost of space. beautiful finish. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Keneisha

product_meta.title: Palace Imports 100% Solid Wood Wardrobe with 3 Sliding Louvered Doors, White. 5 Shelves Included. Additional Large Shelves Sold Separately.
product_meta.description:
Color:White
Overall Size: 52"w x 72"h x 22.5"d 
Paint Finishes: White, Mahogany, Mocha, Honey Pine, Java 40% gloss 
Wood Samples: As actual color may vary, wood samples can be mailed out for color matching and wood quality assessment 
Shelf Configurations: 

1 large and 4 small shelves included (standard) Optional additional large shelves sold separately Up to 3 large shelves can be added for the total of 4 All optional and 2 small shelves have 3 adjustable positions in 2.5” increments Optional shelves model numbers: 5681 (White), 5682 (Mahogany), 5683 (Mocha), 5684 (Honey Pine), 5686 (Java) 
Construction & Features: Three 4 mm (5/32") plywood back panels nailed to frame creating robust structure Top flush with side panels to allow combining unlimited number of 2- and 3-sliding door wardrobes 1 solid pine wood clothing rod with metal supports included Felt floor protectors prevent floor from scratches Ships knocked down in 3 boxes and requires assembly 
Door Types: 3 raised panel in Mahogany, Mocha, Honey Pine and louvered in White and Java with bronze pulls 
Door Closing Mechanism: Sliding doors on aluminum dual tracks Ball-bearing bottom guides Metal with Teflon coated top guides Doors are sliding independently Only one door opening is available at a time 
Wood: 100% Brazilian farm grown pine wood kiln dried to prevent splitting and size distortion 
Safety: Lead-free paint compliant with the U.S. Federal Hazardous Substances Act Tipover restraint kit included No man-made materials mean no Formaldehyde or other harmful emissions
feature_bullets: Louvered doors in White and Java colors, raised panel doors in Mahogany, Honey Pine, Mocha colors
4 small , 1 large shelves included; additional large shelves sold separately
Can be combined with 2-sliding door wardrobe to create unlimited number of doors
Ships in 3 boxes and requires assembly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
